datapipes._utilities.utilities.class_import(name)¶
datapipes._utilities.utilities.importClasses(_file=None, _name=None, cls_name_pattern=None)¶
datapipes._utilities.utilities.importModules(_file=None, _name=None)¶
datapipes._utilities.utilities.import_package_modules(_file: str, _name: str)¶

This logic dynamically discovers and imports any subpackage modules to _file. This allows for decorators to be executed.

Parameters

  • _file (str) – the file whose directory location will be used to discover the subpackages

  • _name (str) – the module name
